entities.name: dumbledore family
entities.description: The Dumbledore family is described as a group of people in a photograph. The description mentions the names of each family member: Albus, Percival, Ariana, Kendra, and Aberforth.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is described as looking several years older than his brother Aberforth in the photograph. He is also mentioned to have a different nose shape compared to his brother.

entities.name: percival dumbledore
entities.description: Percival Dumbledore is described as a good-looking man with twinkling eyes even in an old and faded photograph.

entities.name: ariana dumbledore
entities.description: Ariana Dumbledore is described as being little longer than a loaf of bread and not very distinctive-looking in the photograph.

entities.name: kendra dumbledore
entities.description: Kendra Dumbledore is described as having jet black hair pulled into a high bun and dark eyes that remind Harry of Native Americans. Her face has a carved quality about it.

entities.name: aberforth dumbledore
entities.description: Aberforth Dumbledore is described as looking very alike to his brother Albus in the photograph, but with identical shoulder-length hairstyles and matching lacy collared jackets.

relationships.description: Albus and Aberforth are described as looking very alike in the photograph, with identical hairstyles and matching jackets. This suggests a close physical resemblance between the two brothers.
Albus is mentioned as being part of the Dumbledore family, with Kendra as his mother. This establishes a parent-child relationship between Albus and Kendra.
Aberforth is also mentioned as being part of the Dumbledore family, with Kendra as his mother. This establishes a parent-child relationship between Aberforth and Kendra.
Percival is mentioned as being married to Kendra, establishing a spousal relationship between the two.
